1669.content: Make it easy on yourself Norton.

1670.content: I like to think the last thing that went through his head

1672.content: was to wonder how the hell Andy Dufresne ever got the best of him.

1674.content: Not long after the Warden deprived us of his company

1675.content: I got a postcard in the mail.

1676.content: It was blank but the postmark said...

1681.content: When I picture him heading south in his own car with the top down

1684.content: who crawled through a river of shit

1685.content: and came out clean on the other side.

1688.content: Hadley's got him by the toes right?

1689.content: And he says "I believe this boy's about to have himself an accident."

1690.content: Those of us who knew him best talk about him often.

1691.content: I swear the stuff he pulled...

1692.content: "These friends of mine could use a couple of beers!"

1693.content: And he got it.  And he got it!

1694.content: Sometimes it makes me sad though

1696.content: I have to remind myself that some birds aren't meant to be caged.

1697.content: Their feathers are just too bright.

1699.content: the part of you that knows it was a sin to lock them up does rejoice.

1701.content: the place you live in is that much more drab and empty that they're gone.

1702.content: I guess I just miss my friend.

1705.content: Your files say you've served 40 years of a life sentence.

1706.content: Do you feel you've been rehabilitated?

1709.content: You know I don't have any idea what that means.

1710.content: Well it means you're ready to rejoin society...

1711.content: I know what you think it means sonny.

1712.content: To me it's just a madeup word.

1714.content: young fellas like yourself can wear a suit and a tie and have a job.

1715.content: What do you really want to know?

1716.content: Am I sorry for what I did?

1718.content: There's not a day goes by I don't feel regret.

1719.content: Not because I'm in here or because you think I should.

1720.content: I look back on the way I was then.

1722.content: stupid kid who committed that terrible crime.

1724.content: I wanna try and talk some sense to him

1725.content: tell him the way things are.

1728.content: This old man is all that's left.

1732.content: So you go on and stamp your form sonny and stop wasting my time.

1733.content: Because to tell you the truth

1737.content: You don't need to ask me every time you need to go take a piss. Just go. Understand?

1739.content: 40 years I've been asking permission to piss.

1740.content: I can't squeeze a drop without sayso.

1741.content: There's a harsh truth to face.

1742.content: No way I'm gonna make it on the outside.

1743.content: All I do any more is think of ways to break my parole...

1745.content: A terrible thing to live in fear.

1746.content: Brooks Hatlen knew it knew it all too well.

1747.content: All I want is to be back where things make sense

1748.content: where I won't have to be afraid all the time.

1750.content: A promise I made to Andy.

1754.content: if you're reading this you've gotten out now.

1755.content: And if you've come this far maybe you're willing to come a little further.

1756.content: You remember the name of the town don't you?

1758.content: I could use a good man

1759.content: to help me get my project on wheels.

1760.content: I'll keep an eye out for you

1765.content: And no good thing ever dies.

1766.content: I will be hoping that this letter finds you

1769.content: Get busy living or get busy dying.

1771.content: For the second time in my life

1772.content: I'm guilty of committing a crime.

1774.content: Of course I doubt they'll toss up any roadblocks for that.

1775.content: Not for an old crook like me.

1777.content: I find I'm so excited I can barely sit still or hold a thought in my head.

1778.content: I think it's the excitement only a free man can feel.

1779.content: A free man at the start of a long journey

1781.content: I hope I can make it across the border.

1782.content: I hope to see my friend and shake his hand.

1783.content: I hope the Pacific is as blue as it has been in my dreams.
